titles.title: Sawtooth National Recreation Area and Jerry Peak Wilderness Additions Act
Central Idaho Economic Development and Recreation Act
Sawtooth National Recreation Area and Jerry Peak Wilderness Additions Act
Central Idaho Economic Development and Recreation Act
Sawtooth National Recreation Area and Jerry Peak Wilderness Additions Act
Sawtooth National Recreation Area and Jerry Peak Wilderness Additions Act

To establish certain wilderness areas in central Idaho and to authorize various land conveyances involving National Forest System land and Bureau of Land Management land in central Idaho, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 114-229.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 173.

action.text: Mrs. Radewagen moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1138.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
2/26/2015--Introduced. Sawtooth National Recreation Area and Jerry Peak Wilderness Additions Act
Designates specified parcels of federal land in central Idaho as wilderness areas and as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System.
Releases specified portions of the Sawtooth National Recreation Area as wilderness study areas.
Central Idaho Economic Development and Recreation Act
Requires the conveyance of specified parcels of federal land to Blaine and Custer Counties and the cities of Challis, Clayton, and Stanley in central Idaho.
